title: Integrated PBL/PjBL Science Research Project to Strengthen Self-Regulated Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific research methodologies and basic experimental design knowledge
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling for working learners, utilizing discussion boards and asynchronous collaboration tools without real-time interaction

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (deep thinking, metacognition, self-assessment) with over 80% accuracy in PjBL environments
Learners perform autonomous goal-setting and feedback incorporation processes three+ times each in PBL and PjBL environments
Learners organize and submit scientific problem-solving processes utilizing self-regulated learning strategies in five+ stages for final projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
